REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0953 reute r f BC-COMP-U-CARD-<CUCD.O> 06-02 0042

TEXT.TITLE: COMP-U-CARD <CUCD.O> PLANS NAME CHANGE
TEXT.BODY: Comp-U-Card International Inc said it intends to change its name to CUC International Inc. It said shareholders will be asked to approve the new name at the annual meeting on June 16 Reuter
